subject: New Video showing practical use for 12-469 modified radio(s)
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi All,

I just posted a 23 minute video showing a detailed practical/functional 
use for my three 12-469 modified radios in a Ghost Box system  
configuration.  You are invited to watch it at:
http://www.ufogeek.com/spiricomp/spiricomp_practical.wmv

- Mike
